item.title: Expedia 上调全年业绩预期，预订毛额超预期
item.description: Expedia Group Inc.公布的第三季度总预订量好于预期，并表示将上调全年指导目标，这表明进入假期旺季后的需求比该公司之前想象的要强劲。【原文：Expedia Group Inc. posted better-than-expected grossing bookings in the third quarter and said it was raising its full-year guidance, suggesting that demand has proven stronger than the company had previously thought heading into the holiday season.】

item.title: 埃利奥特出价 53 亿美元收购 Citgo，交易面临反弹
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的一家附属公司提出了收购炼油商 Citgo Petroleum Corp. 的替代报价，此举意在回应对其最初出价越来越多的批评。【原文：An affiliate of Elliott Investment Management put forth an alternative offer to buy oil refiner Citgo Petroleum Corp. in a move that’s meant to address mounting criticism of its initial bid.】

item.title: Pinterest 对假日预测疲软，业绩落后于同行
item.description: Pinterest Inc. 在预测假日季度销售疲软后在尾盘交易中下跌，这表明该搜索和发现网络正努力跟上 Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：Pinterest Inc. fell in late trading after forecasting weak sales for the holiday quarter, a sign the search and discovery network is struggling to keep pace with larger peers such as Meta Platforms Inc. and Snap Inc.】

item.title: 特朗普在驱逐计划上获胜后，私营监狱股飙升
item.description: 周三和周四，由于当选总统唐纳德-特朗普承诺对移民实施美国历史上规模最大的大规模拘留和驱逐，私营监狱股票飙升，这些公司看到了潜在的暴利。【原文：Private prison stocks soared Wednesday and Thursday as the companies eyed a potential bonanza from President-elect Donald Trump’s pledge to carry out the largest mass detention and deportation of immigrants in US history.】

item.title: 供应紧张导致电动汽车产量停滞不前，Rivian 坚持实现盈利目标
item.description: Rivian Automotive 公司预计今年最后三个月将实现正毛利，尽管供应链瓶颈扰乱了电动汽车的生产，但该公司仍坚持这一预测。【原文：Rivian Automotive Inc. expects to achieve a positive gross profit in the final three months of the year, sticking with the forecast despite a supply-chain bottleneck that disrupted electric-vehicle output.】

item.title: 人工智能公司顺利度过选举日，未出现重大失误
item.description:
大多数对人工智能的担忧并没有在选举日或选举日之前的几个月中出现。【原文：

Most of the fears about AI did not come to pass on Election Day or in the months leading up to it.

】

item.title: 削减成本取得成效，Lucid 公布的亏损好于预期
item.description: Lucid Group Inc. 公布的第三季度亏损好于预期，原因是这家电动汽车制造商削减成本的势头强劲。【原文：Lucid Group Inc. posted a better-than-expected third-quarter loss as the electric-vehicle maker’s push to cuts costs gathered momentum.】

item.title: Airbnb 乐观展望假期，称 "需求强劲
item.description: 在 "强劲需求趋势 "的推动下，Airbnb 公司发布了假日期间的乐观预测，这让担心增长趋缓的投资者松了一口气。【原文：Airbnb Inc. issued an upbeat forecast for the holiday period driven by “strong demand trends,” a relief to investors who feared that growth was tapering off.】

item.title: 房屋贷款市场竞争激烈，澳新银行利润下滑
item.description: 澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.）首席执行官谢恩-埃利奥特（Shayne Elliott）表示，抵押贷款市场的竞争依然激烈，公司利润未达预期。【原文：ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.’s profit missed estimates as Chief Executive Officer Shayne Elliott said competition in the mortgage market remained intense.】

item.title: 媒体高管认为特朗普执政后交易增多，监管减少
item.description: 媒体高管认为，随着共和党人唐纳德-特朗普当选美国总统，有可能出现更多的合并和放松管制，从而促进广播电视帝国的发展。【原文：Media executives see the possibility for more mergers and deregulation enabling the growth of broadcast and TV empires with the election of Republican Donald Trump to the US presidency.】

item.title: 播客在大选之夜抽雪茄、采访黑帮分子并从马阿拉歌拍片报道
item.description:
塔克-卡尔森的流媒体产生了近 300 万次观看，而《All-In 播客》的观看次数则高达 45 万次

。【原文：

Tucker Carlson’s stream generated nearly 3 million views while the All-In Podcast topped 450,000

】

item.title: 光速公司继续进行战略审查，寻求提高效率
item.description: 加拿大支付公司光速商务公司（Lightspeed Commerce Inc.【原文：Shares of Canadian payment company Lightspeed Commerce Inc. rose as much as 13% Thursday after it reported a better outlook amid a strategic review that could lead to a sale.】

item.title: 伦敦证券交易所考虑修改富时指数规则以吸引外资上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，伦敦证券交易所（London Stock Exchange Group PLC）正在就一项潜在的规则变更进行早期讨论，以允许以外币交易的股票加入英国主要指数，这将是该交易所为吸引股票上市而采取的最大胆的举措之一。【原文：The London Stock Exchange Group PLC is having early discussions about a potential rule change to allow shares that trade in foreign currencies to join major UK indexes, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be one of its boldest moves yet to attract listings.】

item.title: 国内生产总值修正显示加拿大经济增长速度加快
item.description: 根据加拿大统计机构的年度修订，过去三年加拿大的经济增长速度比最初估计的要快。【原文：Canada’s economy grew at a faster pace than initially estimated over the last three years, according to annual revisions by the country’s statistics agency.】

item.title: 蒙特利尔港口敦促特鲁多政府出面结束罢工
item.description: 蒙特利尔港务局呼吁加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）政府出面干预，结束长达一周的罢工，这次罢工扰乱了该国第二大港口的运营。【原文：The Montreal Port Authority is calling on Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government to intervene to end a weeklong strike that is disrupting operations in the country’s second-largest port.】

item.title: 美联储利率决议、鲍威尔新闻发布会分析
item.description: 杰罗姆-鲍威尔摄影师：阿尔-德拉戈/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Jerome Powell Photographer: Al Drago/Bloomberg】

item.title: 受美国证券交易委员会起诉影响的加密货币在特朗普获胜后大涨
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得总统竞选后，美国证券交易委员会主席加里-根斯勒（Gary Gensler）可能离职，这引发了加密货币的反弹，这些加密货币之前被市场监管部门认定为未注册证券。【原文：The likely departure of US Securities and Exchange Commission Chair Gary Gensler following Donald Trump’s victory in the presidential race is sparking a rally in cryptocurrencies that were previously identified as unregistered securities by the markets watchdog.】

item.title: 新分析将特朗普鲸的波罗的海市场收入提升至 8500 万美元
item.description: 一名法国交易员在波利市场（Polymarket）上押注唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将赢得美国总统大选，获利数百万美元，这可能比最初估计的还要多，这要归功于一个与他的活动有新联系的账户网络。【原文：A French trader who made millions of dollars on Polymarket bets that Donald Trump would win the US presidential election may have profited more than initially estimated, thanks to a network of accounts that have been newly linked to his activity.】

item.title: 社交媒体之王唐纳德-特朗普卷土重来，震撼全球市场
item.description: 下巴总管回来了。【原文：The Jawboner-in-Chief is back.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税计划将笼罩欧洲 2025 年的首次公开募股管道
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国总统大选中获胜，为新的欧洲股票销售扫清了眼前的障碍，但围绕关税和其他政策的不确定性使人们对该地区的长期前景产生了疑问。【原文：Donald Trump’s victory in the US presidential election has cleared an immediate hurdle for new European stock sales, but uncertainties around tariffs and other policies raise questions over the region’s longer-term prospects.】

item.title: 美国选民支持至少 520 亿美元的市政借款计划
item.description: 根据彭博社对 S&P Global Market Intelligence 数据的初步投票统计分析，美国人准备批准至少 520 亿美元的州和地方政府借贷措施。【原文：Americans are poised to approve at least $52 billion of state and local government borrowing measures, according to preliminary vote tallies of S&P Global Market Intelligence data analyzed by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 巴里克在金银热潮中与成本和黄金产量搏斗
item.description: 巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp. ）的最新季度财报显示，这家黄金生产商仍在努力控制成本，并利用飙升的金价。【原文：Barrick Gold Corp.’s latest quarterly earnings show the gold producer continues to struggle to control costs and capitalize on the surging price of bullion.】

item.title: Dye & Durham 因竞争调查和收购意向而下挫
item.description: Dye & Durham Ltd 股价下跌达 9.8%，为 2 月份以来最大跌幅，此前加拿大竞争局获得法院命令，对这家法律和商业软件公司涉嫌反竞争的行为进行调查。【原文：Dye & Durham Ltd shares fell as much as 9.8%, the most since February, after Canada’s Competition Bureau obtained a court order to investigate alleged anti-competitive conduct at the legal and business software company.】

item.title: 日元和英镑上涨 1%，美元回吐大选后涨幅
item.description: 美元周四创下 8 月以来最大跌幅，抹去了前一天因唐纳德-特朗普赢得美国总统大选而引发的大幅上涨。【原文：The US dollar fell the most since August Thursday, erasing much of the previous day’s steep gain sparked by Donald Trump winning the US presidential election.】

item.title: 警惕股市守夜人
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长斯托纳拉斯称美国关税将对欧洲经济产生负面影响
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，唐纳德-特朗普在关税、财政政策和移民问题上的竞选承诺的实施将对经济产生 "一定的影响"。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras says an implementation of Donald Trump’s campaign promises on tariffs, fiscal policy and migration would have “certain implications” for the economy.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选引发 ETF 买盘狂潮，交易员投入数十亿资金
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得总统大选后，股票市场一片欣欣向荣，交易员们纷纷抢购风险资产 ETF，因为他们在很大程度上回避了利率上升的前景，而利率上升可能会削弱其中一些策略。【原文：The stock-market euphoria that followed Donald Trump’s presidential victory saw traders snap up risk-asset ETFs as they largely shrugged off the prospect of higher interest rates that threaten to dent some of those strategies.】

item.title: 私募信贷回报超越私募股权投资的时代即将结束
item.description: 根据道富公司（State Street Corp.）编制的数据，第二季度直接贷款机构的回报率超过了私募股权投资机构，尽管各国央行放松货币政策似乎会削弱这一优势。【原文：Returns from direct lenders beat their private equity counterparts in the second quarter, according to data compiled by State Street Corp., even as the easing of monetary policy by central banks looks set to dent the advantage.】

item.title: 墨西哥储蓄减少资本支出，TC 能源股价上涨
item.description: TC Energy Corp. 的股价升至四年多来的最高点，原因是这家加拿大管道公司降低了资本支出预期，因为墨西哥的一个管道项目节省了资金。【原文：TC Energy Corp. shares rose to the highest in more than four years as the Canadian pipeline company reduced its capital spending forecast because of savings on a pipeline project in Mexico.】

item.title: 凯雷首席执行官称迅速的美国大选结果将为交易充电
item.description: 凯雷投资集团公司（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. top boss Harvey Schwartz said the clear outcome to the presidential election will give corporate chiefs and investors more security to make big decisions and do more deals.】
